Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Authorizes the Yonkers parking authority to issue bonds or notes in the principal amount not to exceed thirty million dollars
Summary: Authorizes the Yonkers parking authority to issue bonds or notes in the principal amount not to exceed thirty million dollars to finance critical infrastructure improvements to parking facilities located in the city of Yonkers.
LawCode: Amd ยง1596-i, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the Yonkers parking authority to issue bonds or notes in the principal amount not to exceed thirty million dollars to finance critical infrastructure improvements to parking facilities located in the city of Yonkers
